snippet: The Internal Revenue Service said Friday that it had paid whistle-blowers $53 million last year for turning in tax cheats.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service says that it paid whistle-blowers $53 million in 2013 for turning in tax cheats.
lead_paragraph: The Internal Revenue Service said Friday that it had paid whistle-blowers $53 million last year for turning in tax cheats.

headline.main: I.R.S. Paid Whistle-Blowers $53 Million Last Year
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Paid Whistle-Blowers $53 Million Last Year
